posts.post_title: Just one n300 Mayo left - Bill Hallman SGC 30...creaseless!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
I have several n300s available for sale including a couple of the tougher variations and some of the more popular stars from the late 19th century.  Prices include shipping and scans are available upon request.  

I'd be willing to trade any of these for items off my wantlist as well.  Zeenuts, w590s, t210 orange borders, e90-3 color variations, w502s, etc....

Thanks in advance,

Brian

posts.post_title: Just one n300 Mayo left - Bill Hallman SGC 30...creaseless!
posts.post_content:

No creases and a great photo.  A nick on the left border and one on the bottom kept this grade from being higher.  There is a tiny scuff on the back as well.  Asking $265....
